name: NASA Mission Control Project
des: NASA mission control dashboard to schedule missions targeting Kepler exoplanets. All the functionalities are dynamic using back-end and followed the MVC pattern.Docker have used to Hosted on Amazon EC2 server. CI/CD and API unit test has checked its safety issue

name: Tourism-client-side-full-stack-web
des: This a website for your next trip. It has the back-end & user can book their next trip ticket.  CI/CD has implemented to test API. Frontend and backend is hosted on AWS EC2 server. So that you can know more about the place you visit.

name: Health-care-website
des: Here is a website that helps you with your dental care.User can find here excellent doctors. And It’s a very minimal website that user can easily access It’s all features. Also we provide user authentication using firebase and it’s fully responsive for all devices. User can book their appointment on time. Also we provide 24/7 support in our contact page.

name: Amazon-Simple-Cart
des: User can come here and buy their products. This fully build with react js. Also User can place order. We provide a simple cart system for user. A simple search system for user
